page.title: Agency Reporting Template 2026 | White Label Client Reports
page.metaDescription: Scale your agency with automated, white-label Google Ads & Meta Ads reports. Manage 50+ clients effortlessly. Real-time dashboards customized with your brand.
page.h1:
Client Reporting that
Scales With Your Agency.
page.subtitle: Stop wasting billable hours on screenshots. Flipika enables agencies to automate premium, white-label reports for hundreds of clients in minutes.
page.costSubtitle: Every hour your Account Managers spend on Excel is an hour not spent on strategy.
page.metricsSubtitle: Simplify the complex. Show value instantly.
page.howItWorksSubtitle: Onboard a new client in under 5 minutes
page.useCasesSubtitle: From boutique shops to large networks
page.tipsTitle: 7 Tips to Retain Clients with Reports
page.tipsSubtitle: Turn reporting from a chore into a retention tool

step1.title: Connect MCC Account
step1.description: Link your Google Ads MCC once. All sub-accounts become instantly available for reporting. No individual logins needed.

step2.title: Set Global Branding
step2.description: Upload your agency logo, set your hex colors, and map your custom domain (reports.youragency.com). This applies specific branding to all reports.

step3.title: Assign Templates
step3.description: Build one 'Master Template' and apply it to 50 clients in a click. Updates to the master template propagate everywhere.

step4.title: Automate Dispatch
step4.description: Set rules: 'Send standard report on Monday at 9AM'. Sit back and let Flipika handle the weekly updates.

executive.title: The Executive Summary
executive.description: Perfect for C-level reporting and board presentations. Focuses on high-level KPIs like ROAS, total spend, and conversion value. Designed to answer the question: 'Is my money being spent wisely?' in 10 seconds. Including time-series charts, month-over-month comparisons, and automated alerts on performance anomalies. Ideal for CMOs, CFOs, and entrepreneurs who want the big picture without drowning in technical details.

ecommerce.title: The E-commerce ROAS Tracker
ecommerce.description: Granular product performance, shopping campaign analysis, and revenue attribution. Drill down by product category, item ID, or location to identify your most profitable segments. Track average order value, conversion rate, and margin per product. Compare performance across different bidding strategies (Target ROAS, Maximize Conversions). Perfect for e-commerce businesses managing 100+ product catalogs who need to know exactly which products drive the best advertising ROI.

agency.title: The Agency Overview
agency.description: Manage multiple clients? Get a unified view of all your accounts performance in one place. Spot underperforming accounts instantly and allocate your time where it matters most. Multi-account dashboard with real-time alerts, automated reports sent every Monday morning, and white-label export for client presentations. Track budget spent vs. allocated, identify cross-sell opportunities, and prove your value with clear metrics.

automation.title: Massive Time Savings
automation.description: Reduce reporting time by 90%. One account manager can handle 2x more clients if they don't spend Fridays building reports.

realtime.title: Client Portal
realtime.description: Give clients a permanent link. They can check stats anytime. Transparency builds trust and reduces 'How are we doing?' emails.

design.title: Premium Brand Image
design.description: Your reports look like custom software built by your agency. Impress new leads during pitches with live demo dashboards.

whitelabel.title: 100% White Label
whitelabel.description: Your domain, your email sender (SMTP), your logo. Flipika is completely invisible to your end clients.

multidevice.title: Pitch Mode
multidevice.description: Use the dashboard on a tablet during client meetings. Interactive data makes you look more prepared and professional.

support.title: Priority Agency Support
support.description: Agencies get a dedicated account manager. We help you migrate your legacy reports and train your team.

speed.title: Blazing Fast Loader
speed.description: Looker Studio can take 10s+ to load. Flipika loads in milliseconds thanks to our optimized caching layer.

branding.title: White Label Perfection
branding.description: No 'Google' logo everywhere. Your brand, your colors, your domain.

stability.title: It Just Works
stability.description: No more random connector disconnects or broken visualisations.

time.title: Endless Monthly Reporting
time.description: Generating 50 separate client reports used to take 'Reporting Week'. Now it takes 0 minutes.

errors.title: Wrong Client Data
errors.description: Sending Company A's data to Company B is a nightmare scenario. Automation eliminates manual handling risks.

opportunity.title: Client Retention
opportunity.description: Clients leave when they feel neglected. Live dashboards gives them 24/7 visibility, building massive trust.

testimonial1.quote: Switching to Flipika saved us the equivalent of one full-time employee salary in reporting hours. The ROI was immediate.
testimonial1.author: David K.

testimonial2.quote: Our clients love the live link. They feel more in control, and we spend less time answering basic status questions.
testimonial2.author: Elena R.

testimonial3.quote: The white-label feature is flawless. Clients ask us 'How much did it cost to build this dashboard software?' It makes us look huge.
testimonial3.author: Marc B.

ecommerce.title: Ecom Client Monthly
ecommerce.description: Focus on ROAS and Sales. Show the direct revenue impact of your agency's work clearly.

leadgen.title: Lead Gen Weekly
leadgen.description: Keep sales teams happy with weekly lead flow updates. quality and volume metrics front and center.

agency.title: Internal Portfolio View
agency.description: For Agency Owners. See all client performance in one table. Spot which clients are unhappy (low ROAS) before they churn.

local.title: Franchise Reporting
local.description: Manage multi-location franchises. Report on performance per store/city while giving corporate a global view.

saas.title: Onboarding New Clients
saas.description: Wow new clients in the first 7 days. Send a 'First Wins' report showing immediate impact of your account takeover.

tip1.title: Use Executive Summaries
tip1.description: Clients are busy. Add a text widget at the top with 3 bullet points written by the AM. Don't just show charts.

tip2.title: Automate 'Bad News' Alerts
tip2.description: Set internal alerts if a client's metrics drop. Fix it before they notice and call you. Proactive > Reactive.

tip3.title: Show Year-over-Year
tip3.description: Seasonality matters. Always compare this month to the same month last year to show true growth.

tip4.title: Educate with Tooltips
tip4.description: Clients don't know what 'Impression Share' is. Flipika has built-in definitions so you don't have to explain acronyms every time.

tip5.title: Brand Consistency
tip5.description: Ensure every report uses the exact same layout. Consistency breeds trust and makes your agency look organized.

tip6.title: Transparency is Key
tip6.description: Don't hide the spend. Show exactly what goes to Google vs your fees if applicable. Transparency reduces billing friction.

tip7.title: Upsell with Data
tip7.description: Show 'Lost Impression Share due to Budget' prominently. It's the easiest way to ask for a budget increase.

faq.q1: How does pricing work for agencies?
faq.a1: We have a flat agency plan or per-client pricing, whichever scales better for you. No hidden fees for adding team members.
faq.q2: Can I use my own domain?
faq.a2: Yes, CNAME support is included in Agency plans. Your clients will see report.youragency.com.
faq.a3: Yes, connect your top-level MCC and all sub-accounts are automatically imported and synced.
faq.a4: Yes, create a 'Standard Agency Template' and apply it to all new clients in one click. Massive time saver.
faq.q5: Is there a limit on clients?
faq.a5: No hard limits. We have agencies managing 500+ accounts on Flipika. The infrastructure scales automatically.
faq.a6: No, clients get 'View Only' access. They can interact with date filters but cannot break the layout or change data.
faq.a7: Yes, unlimited PDF exports. Great for physical meetings or clients who insist on email attachments.
faq.a8: You can connect an MCC and generate your first 10 reports in under 15 minutes. It's plug-and-play.
